txt.en: 'There is much tending of the Wildwood to be done.'
Thornmane is in the eastern Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Thornmane.
'Ah yes, excellent work, my little friend. These seeds and saplings have much promise. You have given me hope for the Wildwood.'

'The Orcs and brigands have done much to harm the forest here. A fine grove once stood where yonder town now squats. If you are of a mind to assist me once more, I would ask another boon of you. While you are trapessing throughout the Wildwood, keep your eyes open for seeds and young saplings, that we might heal some of the damage that has been done.'
Thornmane needs assistance gathering saplings and seeds to help restore the depleted Wildwood forest.
Seeds and saplings to replenish the Wildwood can be found in central Wildwood.\n\nThornmane has asked you to gather seeds and saplings to help restore the forest.
